parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The auto-renewal cycle.

Valid values: 1 and 3.

parameters.name: PeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the auto-renewal duration.

Valid values: Year and Month.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the reserved instances. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RenewalStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically renew the reserved instances. Valid values:

*   AutoRenewal: automatically renews the reserved instances.
*   Normal: manually renews the reserved instances.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the reserved instances.
